scripts.dev: npx --yes kill-port 8000 && node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const p = process.platform === 'win32' ? '.\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe' : './venv/bin/python'; spawn(p, ['-m', 'uvicorn', 'main:app', '--host', '0.0.0.0', '--port', '8000', '--reload'], { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true });"
